---
title: Test brand logo size variants
format: html
brand:
  logo:
    small: small-logo.png
    medium: medium-logo.png
    large: large-logo.png
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      ensureFileRegexMatches:
        -
          - '<img src="\.(/|\\)small-logo\.png".*>'
          - '<img src="\.(/|\\)medium-logo\.png".*>'
          - '<img src="\.(/|\\)large-logo\.png".*>'
        - []
